00035 #if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00036 /* Windows requires definitions for the POSIX file I/O functions */ 
00037 #        include <io.h>
00038 #        define _INTEGRAL_MAX_BITS 64
00039 #        define read(fd,pbuffer,count) _read(fd,pbuffer,count)
00040 #        define write(fd,pbuffer,count) _write(fd,pbuffer,count)
00041 #        define open(fn,flag) _open(fn,flag)
00042 #        define open3(fn,flag,mode) _open(fn,flag,mode)
00043 //# define close(fd) _close(fd)
00044 #        define lseek64(handle,offset,origin) _lseeki64(handle,offset,origin)
00045 #        define sleep(t) Sleep(1000*(t))
00046 #        define sync() ;
00047 #        define off64_t __int64
00048 #        define size64_t __int64
00049 #elif defined ( TARGET_OS_LINUX )
00050 #        define open3(fn,flag,mode) open(fn,flag,mode)
00051 #        define lseek64(handle,offset,origin) lseek(handle,offset,origin)
00052 #        define FlushFileBuffers(i) 1
00053 #        define off64_t long long
00054 #        define size64_t long long
00055 #else
00056 #        define open3(fn,flag,mode) open(fn,flag,mode)
00057 #        define FlushFileBuffers(i) 1
00058 #        define size64_t long long
00059 #endif
00060     
00061 #if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00062 #        define _WIN32_WINNT 0x500 /* Require Windows NT5 (2K, XP, 2K3) */
00063 #        include <windows.h>
00064 #        include <time.h>
00065 #else
00066 #        include <unistd.h>
00067 #        include <sys/time.h>
00068 #endif
00069     
00070 #include <stdio.h>
00071 #include <sys/types.h>
00072 #include <sys/stat.h>
00073 #include <fcntl.h>
00074 #include <errno.h>
00075     
00076 /* Thread_emulation.h */ 
00077 /* Author: Johnson M. Hart */ 
00078 /* Emulate the Pthreads model for the Win32 platform */ 
00079 /* The emulation is not complete, but it does provide a subset */ 
00080 /* required for a first project */ 
00081     
00082 #ifndef _THREAD_EMULATION
00083 #    define _THREAD_EMULATION
00084     
00085 /* Thread management macros */ 
00086 #    if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00087 /* Win32 */ 
00088 #            define _WIN32_WINNT 0x500 /* WINBASE.H - Enable SignalObjectAndWait */
00089 #            include <process.h>
00090 #            include <windows.h>
00091 #            define THREAD_FUNCTION unsigned int __stdcall
00092 #            define THREAD_FUNCTION_RETURN unsigned int
00093 #            define THREAD_SPECIFIC_INDEX DWORD
00094 #            define pthread_t unsigned long
00095 #            define pthread_attr_t DWORD
00096 #            define pthread_create(thhandle,attr,thfunc,tharg) (int)( (*thhandle = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex(NULL,0,&thfunc,tharg,0,NULL) ) == NULL)
00097 #            define pthread_join(thread, result) ((WaitForSingleObject((thread),INFINITE)!=WAIT_OBJECT_0) || !CloseHandle(thread))
00098 #            define pthread_detach(thread) if(thread!=NULL)CloseHandle(thread)
00099 #            define thread_sleep(nms) Sleep(nms)
00100 #            define pthread_cancel(thread) TerminateThread(thread,0)
00101 #            define ts_key_create(ts_key, destructor) {ts_key = TlsAlloc();};
00102 #            define pthread_getspecific(ts_key) TlsGetValue(ts_key)
00103 #            define pthread_setspecific(ts_key, value) TlsSetValue(ts_key, (void *)value)
00104 #            define pthread_self() GetCurrentThreadId()
00105 #    else
00106 /* pthreads */ 
00107 /* Nearly everything is already defined */ 
00108 #            define THREAD_FUNCTION void *
00109 #            define THREAD_FUNCTION_RETURN void *
00110 #            define THREAD_SPECIFIC_INDEX pthread_key_t
00111 #            define thread_sleep(nms) sleep((nms+500)/1000)
00112 #            define ts_key_create(ts_key, destructor) pthread_key_create (&(ts_key), destructor);
00113 #    endif
00114     
00115 /* Syncrhronization macros: Win32 and Pthreads */ 
00116 #    if defined ( TARGET_OS_WINDOWS )
00117 #            define pthread_mutex_t HANDLE
00118 #            define pthread_cond_t HANDLE
00119 #            define pthread_mutex_lock(pobject) WaitForSingleObject(*pobject,INFINITE)
00120 #            define pthread_mutex_unlock(pobject) ReleaseMutex(*pobject)
00121 #            define pthread_mutex_init(pobject,pattr) (*pobject=CreateMutex(NULL,FALSE,NULL))
00122 #            define pthread_cond_init(pobject,pattr) (*pobject=CreateEvent(NULL,FALSE,FALSE,NULL))
00123 #            define pthread_mutex_destroy(pobject) CloseHandle(*pobject)
00124 #            define pthread_cond_destroy(pobject) CloseHandle(*pobject)
00125 #            define CV_TIMEOUT INFINITE /* Tunable value */
00126 #            define pthread_cond_wait(pcv,pmutex) {SignalObjectAndWait(*pmutex,*pcv,INFINITE,FALSE);WaitForSingleObject(*pmutex,INFINITE);};
00127 #            define pthread_cond_signal(pcv) SetEvent(*pcv)
00128 #    else
00129     /* Not Windows. Assume pthreads */ 
00130 #    endif
00131     
00132 #endif
